A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If I could give this movie a lower rating\, I would. This movie is now my least favorite movie in the entire Star Wars franchise. So much wasted time and energy in this movie. Maybe Disney thought Episode 7 was too much of a rehash of a Episode 4 so they decided to do something so different that everyone would be divided on it and no longer trust the critics. The plot holes alone make me question whether or not Disney bought critics and websites (including this one) so they could trick audiences into thinking this would be a movie worth seeing. Sadly\, it is not.
